about_the_game:
In Exoplanet Outpost, you will establish and manage a thriving colony on a distant exoplanet, balancing economic growth, tourism, and defense against relentless alien threats. Begin with a team of intrepid pioneers and transform your base into a bustling hub of commerce and culture.

  • Resource Management: Mine resources, research technologies, and build infrastructure to support your colony's growth.

  • Tourist Attractions: Create stunning attractions to draw interstellar tourists, from casinos to mystical temples.

  • Alien Combat: Defend your outpost from diverse alien species with advanced technology and strategic defenses.

  • Dynamic Economy: Engage in interstellar trade and manage a complex economy, balancing production, consumption, and resource allocation.

  • Advanced Technologies: Research and develop cutting-edge technologies to enhance your colony's capabilities and defenses.

  • Campaign Missions: Embark on focussed scenario missions that challenge your strategic thinking and decision-making skills.

  • Environmental Challenges: Adapt to harsh planetary conditions, unexpected events, and alien ecosystems that test your colony's resilience.

Experience the ultimate blend of economic strategy, tourism management, and thrilling combat in Exoplanet Outpost.

STORY

In the not-so-distant future, humanity's quest for survival and expansion has reached the stars. Faced with dwindling resources on Earth and the discovery of habitable exoplanets, the Galactic Federation has launched a series of ambitious colonization missions. Among these is "Exoplanet Outpost", a critical initiative aimed at establishing a sustainable human presence on a distant, resource-rich world.

As the commander of this outpost, you are tasked with transforming a wild alien landscape into a thriving hub of economic activity, interstellar tourism, and robust defenses against unforeseen alien threats.

The planet holds untold riches and ancient mysteries, but it also harbors unknown dangers. Alien species and rebel bandits roam the planet, posing both opportunities and threats to your fledgling colony. You must navigate these challenges and harness its resources to build a prosperous and self-sustaining settlement.

As you expand your outpost, you'll engage in interstellar trade and attract tourists from across the galaxy with unique attractions and experiences. Your success will depend on your ability to balance economic growth, maintain defenses, and foster a harmonious community amid the stars.

The fate of Exoplanet Outpost lies in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge and lead humanity's next great chapter in the cosmos?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible 3D Graphics Card with Shader Model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Establish a base on a distant planet. In this immersive sci-fi colony building sim, you'll balance economic growth, tourism, and defense against hostile alien forces. Your decisions shape the fate of your settlement and its inhabitants. Are you ready to thrive on the frontier of space?
